graph_title: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
indicator_name: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
page_content:
Non-statistical indicator
We have identified the following to be relevant to this indicator - An invasive alien species strategy for Canada.

fr.graph_title: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
fr.indicator_name: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
fr.page_content:
Indicateur non statistique
Nous avons identifié les éléments suivants comme étant pertinents pour cet indicateur - Une stratégie sur les espèces exotiques envahissantes pour le Canada.
fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 15 : Préserver et restaurer les écosystèmes terrestres, en veillant à les exploiter de façon durable, gérer durablement les forêts, lutter contre la désertification, enrayer et inverser le processus de dégradation des terres et mettre fin à l’appauvrissement de la biodiversité
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 15.8 : Proportion de pays ayant adopté une législation nationale pertinente et allouant des ressources suffisantes à la prévention ou au contrôle des espèces exotiques envahissantes
fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 15.8.1 : Proportion de pays ayant adopté une législation nationale pertinente et allouant des ressources suffisantes à la prévention ou au contrôle des espèces exotiques envahissantes
fr.SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Objectif 15 : Préserver et restaurer les écosystèmes terrestres, en veillant à les exploiter de façon durable, gérer durablement les forêts, lutter contre la désertification, enrayer et inverser le processus de dégradation des terres et mettre fin à l’appauvrissement de la biodiversité
fr.SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Cible 15.8 : Proportion de pays ayant adopté une législation nationale pertinente et allouant des ressources suffisantes à la prévention ou au contrôle des espèces exotiques envahissantes
fr.SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicateur 15.8.1 : Proportion de pays ayant adopté une législation nationale pertinente et allouant des ressources suffisantes à la prévention ou au contrôle des espèces exotiques envahissantes
fr.un_custodian_agency: Union internationale pour la conservation de la nature (UICN)
fr.goal_meta_link_text: Métadonnées des objectifs de développement durable des Nations Unies

SDG_GOAL: Goal 15: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
SDG_TARGET: Target 15.8: By 2020, introduce measures to prevent the introduction and significantly reduce the impact of invasive alien species on land and water ecosystems and control or eradicate the priority species
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 15.8.1: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
STAT_CONC_DEF:
This indicator aims to quantify trends in:
Commitment by countries to relevant multinational agreements, specifically:
(1) National adoption of invasive alien species relevant policy.
Percentage of countries with:
(a) national legislation and policy relevant to invasive alien species.
(b) targets and objectives within national strategies for preventing and controlling invasive alien species are aligned with Aichi Target 9.
The translation of policy arrangements into action by countries to implement policy and actively prevent and control invasive alien species (IAS) and the resourcing of this action, specifically:
(2) National allocation of resources towards the prevention or control of IAS.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 15: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 15.8: By 2020, introduce measures to prevent the introduction and significantly reduce the impact of invasive alien species on land and water ecosystems and control or eradicate the priority species
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 15.8.1: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
un_custodian_agency: International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN)
